remarks: The set ` n ZZ ` is an ideal in ` ZZ ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ znlidl as of 13-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
znvalOLD.z $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
znvalOLD.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` Z ) $.
znlidlOLD $p |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) $.
